settings.question: How do I create an account?
settings.answer: To create a customer account, click here.

settings.question: How do I reset my password?
settings.answer: To reset your customer account password, click here.

settings.question: How do I update my account details?
settings.answer: Once you are logged into your customer account, select "Addresses to update your address information or "Order Details" to see your order history.

settings.question: I have a question about my order
settings.answer: If you have a question about your order, please fill out the online contact form here or call our customer support team at 614-863-3004.

settings.question: When will I receive my order?
settings.answer: Orders are processed Monday - Friday with standard shipping. If your order is placed between Friday 3pm EST and Sunday 11:59pm EST, it will ship Monday or the next business day if a holiday.

settings.question: Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer: We are only able to cancel your order if it has not been shipped yet. To cancel your order, fill out the contact form here and a team member will reply via email. Our team is only available Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm EST. If your order has already been shipping, you will have to process a return.

settings.question: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.answer: There is free shipping on orders over $100, or on all subscription orders. All subscriptions receive free shipping and a 10% discount; this cannot be combined with other discounts.

settings.question: What are shipping costs?
settings.answer: U.S. domestic orders are $3.90 for standard shipping. Free shipping is available for orders over $100 or on subscription orders.

settings.question: Can I return my order?
settings.answer: Returns are only accepted for unopened products. If you have questions, please contact our customer support team here.

settings.question: How do I return my order?
settings.answer: If you would like to return your order, please fill out the online contact form here and include the order number. A customer support representative will reach out to you to process the return.

settings.question: My product is damaged/the bottle is open.
settings.answer: If your product arrives damaged or the seal is broken, please fill out our online contact form here and a member of our customer support team will assist you.

settings.question: How do I reach a customer support representative?
settings.answer: To contact customer support, fill our out online contact form here and a representative will reply to you via email, or you may call our team at 614-863-3004. Our office hours are M-F, 9am-5pm.
